Description: Fragment of body of Clazomenian black-figure painted pottery broad amphora. Two ithyphallic satyrs and a maenad. Purple for beard, hair, nipple of first satyr: two purple stripes at the top of the dark area below. White for female flesh, dots on fillet, and rosettes on skirt. The maenad has a necklace of dots of the dark paint.
Bibliographic references: Vase / Catalogue of Vases in the British Museum (B125.6)
CVA British Museum 8 / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum: Great Britain 13, British Museum 8 (Pl. GB 588, 9)
Weber 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus anderen ägyptischen Fundorten (TD 150)
